Race.SpecificTitle: Council Member -- District 3, City of Oakdale
City of Oakdale -- 5.78 Mill - Mayor & City Council - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
CITY OF OAKDALE PROPOSITION
(TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEARS, 5.78 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES IN THE CITY, INCLUDING THE PURCHASE OF FIRE TRUCKS AND EQUIPMENT THEREFOR.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Oakdale, State of Louisiana (the "City"), be authorized to continue to levy a five and seventy-eight hundredths (5.78) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $89,359) on all the property subject to taxation in the City for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities in the City, including the purchase of fire trucks and equipment therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: Ambulance Serv. Dist.No.1 -- 10.02 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
AMBULANCE SERVICE DISTRICT NO. 1 PROPOSITION
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 10.02 MILLS TAX RENEWAL FOR ACQUIRING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING EQUIPMENT AND FACILITIES NECESSARY TO PROVIDE AMBULANCE SERVICE AND CARE FOR THE RESIDENTS OF AMBULANCE SERVICE DISTRICT NO. 1.
Race.FullText: Shall Ambulance Service District No. 1 of the Parish of Allen, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a ten and two hundredths (10.02) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $426,040) on all of the property subject to taxation in said District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of acquiring, maintaining and operating equipment and facilities necessary to provide ambulance service and care for the residents of the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Drainage District No. 2 -- 4 Mill - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
DRAINAGE DISTRICT NO. 2 PROPOSITION 
(TAX CONTINUATION)
(KINDER DRAINAGE DISTRICT NO. 2)
 
SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 4 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING THE DISTRICT'S DRAINAGE WORKS.
Race.FullText: Shall Drainage District No. 2 of the Parish of Allen, State of Louisiana (Kinder Drainage District No. 2), levy a special tax of four (4) mills (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $72,688) on all the property subject to taxation in said District, for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of improving, maintaining and operating said District's drainage works?
